description:
For more than 25 years, Kitay Law Offices in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, has provided unmatched counsel and support to a diverse range of clients throughout the state who have legal needs involving any of the following areas:

  • Personal injury and car accidents
  • Workers' compensation
  • Criminal and DUI defense
  • Immigration law

Over the course of our history, our law firm has grown to include six total offices in Pennsylvania, making us one of our state's most prominent and successful full-service legal practices. This level of success is the direct result of our lawyers' decades of combined legal experience coupled with their unwavering commitment to helping our clients obtain the favorable outcomes they expect and deserve for their serious and complex legal challenges as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

From their efforts, our lawyers have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our injury clients, and they have achieved a long record of securing acquittals, dismissals and reductions of charges for the accused. They have also assisted innumerable individuals and families in seeking better lives in the United States, and our law office offers full bilingual services in English and Spanish to communicate directly with a broader clientele.

Featured on various local and national news programs and online media outlets, our lawyers have gained reputation as being leaders in their field, so you know that you can expect to receive the highest level of representation possible. To begin the process, you can contact Kitay Law Offices to schedule a free initial consultation. Our firm also currently offers virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
